channel.title: Players can't Connect
channel.description:
For some reason players cannot connect to my server through my official client. I thought I edited everything to what it should be, but apparently not. I would really appreciate it if someone could assist me with this so I can move on to bigger and better things with my server. I can't exactly address the problem either because I can connect through my client, just not others. According to a good friend of mine, Rage, my client's run.bat gives a warning that I have a out-dated compiler or something...I've never even heard of that before.
If you could help me out here I'd be very appreciative.
P.S. I should of mentioned this first but it's a Allstar-Scape server and I believe a edited Blurrs client. If you need me to post the batch files or the entire client please comment saying so.

item.title: Players can't Connect
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

[quote=“Nebulae, post:8, topic:461959”]I just get error connecting to server which suggests either server is currently off, IP is wrong or there is something blocking me connecting (do you have firewalls disabled/exceptions made for the port?).

Try: http://canyouseeme.org/[/quote]

When did you try this because my server went down while I was running some tests and various other programs earlier. It is online now and will remain online 24/7.
Yes, I have ALREADY portforwarded and etc.
My only issue is getting my custom client to allow other players that do NOT connect from localhost’s ip to log into my server.

Please try again and tell me what message you get.

Read full topic

item.title: Players can't Connect
item.dc:creator: @Nebulae Nebulae
item.description:
@Nebulae wrote:

I just get error connecting to server which suggests either server is currently off, IP is wrong or there is something blocking me connecting (do you have firewalls disabled/exceptions made for the port?).

Try: http://canyouseeme.org/

Read full topic

item.title: Players can't Connect
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

Nebulae:

Lol. Outdated compiler you say? Usually if you have compiled in Java 7 and they try to run in Java 6 it will give an error. Try to get the exact message from them and post it here.

Add my MSN: "iandrewortiz@gmail.com"
I’ll msg you my client and you can check for yourself because I don’t have anyone that can take a pic of it atm.

Read full topic
